title: Myntra Product Scraper
description: Scrape product listings from Myntra category or search pages (e.g., https://www.myntra.com/men-tshirts).

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: One or more Myntra category, listing, or search URLs to start scraping from.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of results
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of products to collect.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for reliable scraping.
